org.presentation.webcrawler

Interface CrawlerService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    MessageProducer, Stoppable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CrawlerServiceDefault

    public interface CrawlerService
extends MessageProducer, Stoppable
    Interface for web crawler service. Every module, that want to serve as web crawler service provider must register implementation of this service.
    Author:
    Adam Kuger

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CrawlingState getCrawlingState()
      getCrawlingState.
      void initializeCrawler(OptionContainer options)
      Initialize web crawler service by using options set by user when creating new checking request.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.presentation.utils.Stoppable

        stopChecking

    • Method Detail

      • initializeCrawler

        void initializeCrawler(OptionContainer options)
        Initialize web crawler service by using options set by user when creating new checking request.
        Parameters:
        options - OptionContainer object representing options set by user

      • startBrowsing

        void startBrowsing(LinkURL url,
                   int maximalDepth,
                   int pageLimit,
                   PageCrawlingObserver observer,
                   List<Domain> allowedDomains,
                   int requestTimeout,
                   List<Header> addHeaders)
        Starts browsing. Sends messages about valid/invalid links. Modifies crawling state. Creates TraversalGraph.
        Parameters:
        url - starting URL
        maximalDepth - Crawling depth which schould not be overrun.
        pageLimit - Number of fully crawled pages which schould not be overrun.
        observer - Observer object, into which the CrawlerService implementation will send its results.
        addHeaders - Additional headers which are going to be used during fetching pages from remote web server.
        requestTimeout - Time in ms between individual get requests.
        allowedDomains - List of allowed domains on that can crawler continue in his job. Link from other domain will be just checked.

      • getCrawlingState

        CrawlingState getCrawlingState()

        getCrawlingState.

        Returns:
        a CrawlingState object.
